name: City of Abbotsford's Open Data Hub
description: Platform for exploring, analyzing, and downloading open data from the City of Abbotsford. Supports data download in CSV, KML, Zip, GeoJSON, GeoTIFF, PNG. Includes API links for GeoServices, WMS, and more. Enables combining datasets using maps and developing web/mobile applications. Aims to enhance transparency and support public engagement.
